Does not happen with new workspaces.
Occurs when trying to parse the saved state of an editor descriptor.
The "open_in_place" and "internal" attributes have been replaced 
with "openMode".
When reading openMode, it does not check for a missing attribute, hence the NPE 
on old saved state.

Should convert the old attributes to the new attribute, or better yet, keep 
both working to allow post-RCP workspaces to be loaded by pre-RCP Eclipse 
versions.

Fixed in >N20031107.
